entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
